article.title: U.S. Army Purchases Panther Radios
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Â Advanced Electronics Co., Ltd., Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, was awarded a $12,656,358 firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of Panther radios. This contract is in support of foreign military sales. Work will be performed in Saudi Arabia, with an estimated completion date of Dec. 31, 2014. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Warren, Mich., is the contracting activity.
